generated.css: @import url(https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans);*{margin:0;padding:0;box-sizing:border-box}.images-list{flex-wrap:wrap;min-height:200px}.images-list,.images-list .image-container{display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center}.images-list .image-container{border:1px solid #0da308;width:180;padding:9px;margin:15px;flex-direction:column}.images-list .image-container img{width:130px}.images-list .image-container.selected{border-color:#e3f731;border-width:8px}.images-list .image-container .cerrar{text-decoration:none;margin-left:130px;padding-top:-30px;color:#0da308}.images-list .image-container a{transition:all .5s}.images-list .image-container a:hover{color:#940707;font-size:20px}.images-list .image-container .status{color:#0da308}body{font-family:sans-serif;background:url(/a107cb5d0c1c2cfb8aa69a2c736d648c.jpg) no-repeat}.side-header{padding:0;margin:0;position:fixed;width:100%;z-index:5}.logo{display:block;max-width:200px;width:100%}.logo h1{color:#fff;font:normal 56px Cookie,cursive;margin:0 0 10px}.logo span{color:#5383d3}.menu-principal ul{margin:0;padding:0;list-style:none;display:flex;gap:1rem}.menu-principal ul li a{text-decoration:none;color:#fff;text-transform:uppercase;font-size:1rem;transition:all .1s}.menu-principal ul li a:hover{color:#8f9296}.main{padding-top:90px}.parrafo{padding-top:100px;color:#fff;font-size:1.5rem;margin-left:10%;max-width:80%}#container{width:80px;height:80px;position:relative;margin-left:0;align-self:flex-end;top:0;left:0}#burger{cursor:pointer;opacity:0;animation:fadein .2s ease 1s forwards;overflow:hidden;width:100%;height:100%}#burger .bun,#burger .filling{display:block;position:absolute;left:50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%) rotate(0deg);height:10%;width:70%;transform-origin:50% 50%;transition:top .4s ease .4s,transform .4s ease .4s}#burger .bun:after,#burger .bun:before,#burger .filling:after,#burger .filling:before{content:"";display:block;height:40%;background:#fff;position:absolute;top:50%;transform:translateY(-45%);transition:background .2s ease,box-shadow .2s ease}#burger .bun:before,#burger .filling:before{left:0;width:calc(-1px + 75%);border-radius:10px 0 0 10px}#burger .bun:after,#burger .filling:after{right:0;width:calc(-1px + 25%)}#burger:hover .bun.top:before{background:#fee;box-shadow:0 0 10px 1px red}#burger:hover .bun.bottom:before{background:#dff;box-shadow:0 0 10px 1px #0ff}#burger:hover .filling:before{background:#efe;box-shadow:0 0 10px 1px #0f0}#burger .bun.top{top:25%}#burger .bun.bottom{top:75%}#burger .filling{top:50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%) rotate(180deg);animation:green-ls-out .8s ease forwards}#burger.active .bun{border-radius:3px;top:50%;transition:top .4s ease,transform .4s ease}#burger.active .bun.top{transform:translate(-50%,-50%) rotate(-225deg)}#burger.active .bun.bottom{transform:translate(-50%,-50%) rotate(405deg)}#burger.active .filling{transform:translate(-50%,-50%) rotate(-90deg);animation:green-ls-in .8s ease forwards}#navhamb{font-family:Open Sans;color:#fff;position:absolute;transform:translatex(-200%);transition:transform .2s ease;top:80px;bottom:0;padding-right:16px;width:300px}#navhamb.show{transform:translatex(0)}#navhamb ul{list-style:none;padding:0;margin:0;background-color:rgba(28,1,1,.838)}#navhamb ul li{background:#7ce7ff;box-shadow:0 0 0 2px #4df;font-size:1.75em;line-height:1.25em;padding:0;margin:16px 0;width:0;border-radius:0 100px 100px 0;transition:width .2s ease,padding .2s ease,color .2s ease,text-shadow .2s ease}#navhamb ul li:hover{box-shadow:0 0 20px 2px #4df;text-shadow:#4df 0 0 6px,#4df 0 0 10px;width:100%;padding:0 16px 0 0;color:#000}#navhamb ul li a{display:block;text-decoration:none;width:300px;color:inherit;padding-left:16px}#navhamb ul li.green{background:#4dff4d;box-shadow:0 0 0 2px #0f0}#navhamb ul li.green:hover{box-shadow:0 0 20px 2px #0f0;text-shadow:#0f0 0 0 6px,#0f0 0 0 10px}#navhamb ul li.red{background:#ff4d4d;box-shadow:0 0 0 2px red}#navhamb ul li.red:hover{box-shadow:0 0 20px 2px red;text-shadow:red 0 0 6px,red 0 0 10px}#navhamb ul li.purple{background:#db4ddb;box-shadow:0 0 0 2px #c0c}#navhamb ul li.purple:hover{box-shadow:0 0 20px 2px #c0c;text-shadow:#c0c 0 0 6px,#c0c 0 0 10px}#navhamb ul li.yellow{background:#ffff4d;box-shadow:0 0 0 2px #ff0}#navhamb ul li.yellow:hover{box-shadow:0 0 20px 2px #ff0;text-shadow:#ff0 0 0 6px,#ff0 0 0 10px}@keyframes green-ls-in{0%{transform:translate(-50%,-50%) rotate(180deg)}50%{transform:translate(-50%,-50%) rotate(-90deg)}to{transform:translate(-50%,-50%) rotate(-90deg) translate(200%)}}@keyframes green-ls-out{0%{transform:translate(-50%,-200%) rotate(-90deg)}50%{transform:translate(-50%,-50%) rotate(-90deg)}to{transform:translate(-50%,-50%) rotate(180deg)}}@keyframes fadein{0%{Opacity:0}to{Opacity:1}}.footer-distributed{background-color:#292c2f;box-shadow:0 1px 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.12);box-sizing:border-box;width:100%;font:700 16px sans-serif;text-align:left;padding:50px 60px 40px;margin-top:80px;overflow:hidden}.footer-distributed .footer-left{float:left}.footer-distributed h3{color:#fff;font:normal 36px Cookie,cursive;margin:0 0 10px}.footer-distributed h3 span{color:#5383d3}.footer-distributed .footer-links{color:#fff;margin:0 0 10px;padding:0}.footer-distributed .footer-links a{display:inline-block;line-height:1.8;text-decoration:none;color:inherit}.footer-distributed .footer-company-name{color:#8f9296;font-size:14px;font-weight:400;margin:0}.footer-distributed .footer-icons{margin-top:40px}.footer-distributed .footer-icons a{display:inline-block;width:35px;height:35px;cursor:pointer;background-color:#33383b;border-radius:2px;font-size:20px;color:#fff;text-align:center;line-height:35px;margin-right:3px;margin-bottom:5px}.footer-distributed .footer-right{float:right}.footer-distributed .footer-right p{display:inline-block;vertical-align:top;margin:15px 42px 0 0;color:#fff}.footer-distributed form{display:inline-block}.footer-distributed form input,.footer-distributed form textarea{display:block;border-radius:3px;box-sizing:border-box;background-color:#1f2022;box-shadow:0 1px 0 0 hsla(0,0%,100%,.1);border:none;resize:none;font:inherit;font-size:14px;font-weight:400;color:#d1d2d2;width:400px;padding:18px}.footer-distributed ::-webkit-input-placeholder{color:#5c666b}.footer-distributed ::-moz-placeholder{color:#5c666b;opacity:1}.footer-distributed :-ms-input-placeholder{color:#5c666b}.footer-distributed form input{height:55px;margin-bottom:15px}.footer-distributed form textarea{height:100px;margin-bottom:20px}.footer-distributed form button{border-radius:3px;background-color:#33383b;color:#fff;border:0;padding:10px 50px;font-weight:700;float:right}@media (max-width:800px){.footer-distributed{padding:30px}.footer-distributed .footer-left,.footer-distributed .footer-right{float:auto;max-width:auto;margin:0 auto}.footer-distributed .footer-left{margin-bottom:40px}.footer-distributed form{margin-top:30px;display:block}.footer-distributed form button{float:none}}
